body.p:
Dixon June 24th 1865
D H Hughs Esq
Dear Sir

I send you three affidavits of the Strongest I can get if you wish others not quite so strong I can get them but perhaps would have to resort to the country as this is about all I can do in town and by going to the country there is no doubt many might be had as Strong as Cosbys as it was generally understood that John was Scared from home very truly yours
